Growth

For iPhone and iPad

The Growth app gives parents an easy way to keep an eye on the pace of their children's growth and weight and spot any imbalance or deviation from expected growth rates.

Growth

For iPhone and iPad
The Growth app gives parents an easy way to keep an eye on the pace of their children's growth and weight and spot any imbalance or deviation from expected growth rates.

Growth charts are routinely used by pediatricians to monitor the growth of children, particularly in the early stages of life. The Body Mass Index (BMI), calculated from the height and weight, should be monitored throughout the growth years to detect the onset of weight issues which influence the long-term health of a child.

Keeping track of this data is difficult and charting curves on paper to find approximate percentiles is tedious and imprecise, as is calculating BMIs.

"Growth” allows you to record the measurements of children in metric or English units, computes the percentiles and BMIs and produces neat growth charts for weight, height, head circumference and BMI. Reference percentile curves based on World Health Organization (WHO) and Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) stats are built-in and range from birth to up to 20 years. Unlike paper-based charts, the graphs are adjusted to fit the current age of your child, making this app ideal for all stages of life—newborns and teenagers alike. Better still, the app automatically computes exact percentiles for your measurements, offering much more precision and confidence than with the paper-based method. Importantly, your data is not locked into the app, as you can email the charts and tables or save and the charts as images.

Visit the App Store page for more details and screenshots.
